title: OPSS Regulatory Leaders Graduate Scheme - Meet us at a University Careers Fair

content.text: Join Us at a University Careers Fair
Are you a student looking to kickstart your career with a dynamic and impactful role?
Come and meet us at the University careers fairs and learn more about our Regulatory Leaders Graduate Scheme.
This is your chance to discover exciting opportunities and get all your questions answered in person. Here are the dates and locations where you can find us:
Don't miss out on this opportunity to learn more about how you can become a part of an innovative organisation. We look forward to meeting you!
